body_html: Thanks, It's running. But there is a 'bug', if my root directory is "tensorflow-master", the "bazel-tensorflow-master" would be initialized, but the build.gradle is looking for the "bazel-tensorflow". So ,it need to rename the directory

body: Thanks, It's running. But there is a 'bug', if my root directory is "tensorflow-master", the "bazel-tensorflow-master" would be initialized, but the build.gradle is looking for the "bazel-tensorflow". So ,it need to rename the directory
